<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Master Summoner Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=2961) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 77 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Summoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=96)

**Prerequisites**
[Expert Summoner Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=2959); legendary in the skill associated with your [eidolon's](/classes/summoner/eidolons) tradition

</column>

---

You gain the [master bounded spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=1485).
